control.name: 6.4.3 Do not use production PANs in testing, development or pre-production environments
control.desc: Security controls are usually not as stringent in test or development environments. Use of production data provides malicious individuals with the opportunity to gain unauthorized access to production data (cardholder data).

test.steps:
4.3 Examine documentation and interview personnel to verify that security policies and operational procedures for encrypting transmissions of cardholder data are:

- Documented,

- In use, and

- Known to all affected parties.
